author: kalgiz
body:
Command Wait-UntilTrue does not terminate some operations after timeout.

Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell

Wait-UntilTrue { start-sleep 60} -timeout 1000
```

Expected behavior
-----------------
Terminating the command start-sleep after 1000 miliseconds.

Actual behavior
---------------
Waiting 60 seconds until the start-sleep finishes.

----------------

```powershell

```
